DocAttribute.Name: UDegree
DocAttribute.Documentation: Algebraic degree of basis functions in _u_.

DocAttribute.Name: VDegree
DocAttribute.Documentation: Algebraic degree of basis functions in _v_.

DocAttribute.Name: ControlPointsList
DocAttribute.Documentation: This is a list of lists of control points.

DocAttribute.Name: UClosed
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indication of whether the surface is closed in the _u_ direction; this is for information only.

DocAttribute.Name: VClosed
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indication of whether the surface is closed in the _v_ direction; this is for information only.

DocAttribute.Name: SelfIntersect
DocAttribute.Documentation: Flag to indicate whether, or not, surface is self-intersecting; this is for information only.

DocAttribute.Name: UUpper
DocAttribute.Documentation: Upper index on control points in _u_ direction.

DocAttribute.Name: VUpper
DocAttribute.Documentation: Upper index on control points in _v_ direction.

DocAttribute.Name: ControlPoints
DocAttribute.Documentation: Array (two-dimensional) of control points defining surface geometry. This array is constructed from the control points list.
